definition: "dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
Du Fu (712-770), great Tang dynasty poet
Koo Chen-fu (1917-2005), Taiwanese businessman and diplomat
to have just recovered from a shock
Li Linfu (-752), Tang politician, chancellor under Tang emperor Xuanzong 玄宗
Wang Shifu (fl. 1295-1307), author of Romance of the West Chamber 西廂記|西厢记
Huangfu Song (-195), later Han general and warlord
Pavlov (name)/Ivan Petrovich Pavlov (1849-1936), Russian experimental psychologist
Du Fu's Thatched Cottage (park and museum in Chengdu)
Huangfu Bo (c. 800), Minister during early Tang
court crown beneath straw shoe (idiom); everything turned upside down

sentences.english: Wu Sun-fu listened attentively, his eyes riveted on Chao Potao's face.
sentences.chinese: 吴荪甫很注意地听着，眼光射定了赵伯韬的面孔。
吴荪甫的脸色突然变了。

sentences.english: I married my wife Fu Liya in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 我在1983年和我现在的夫人甫立亚结婚。

sentences.english: Add egg whites to broth and heat. Then pour the mixture on top of the melon. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 将蛋白加入鸡汤煮成汁，淋在节瓜甫上即成。

sentences.english: The Orpheum Wiener House stayed afloat all through the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 从大萧条开始到结束，俄尔甫香肠之家一直垮。

sentences.english: Baotianman Nature Reserve, located just City, Neixiang County area.
sentences.chinese: 宝天曼自然保护区，位于甫阳市内乡县辖区内。

sentences.english: CT284 has been displayed at I-Lan Sports Park.
sentences.chinese: 甫抵宜兰县立运动公园的CT284。

sentences.english: So Fan prescribed twenty four grams of ephedra (Mahuang), and told his father to boil it.
sentences.chinese: 故范文甫开二十四克麻黄，让费父为子煎服。

sentences.english: The glazed eyes stirred and Wu Sun - fu brought up a gobbet of phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 吴荪甫的眼珠动了，咕的吐出一堆浓痰。

sentences.english: A secretary Alifu patiently and speak the truth, do not listen to Alifu.
sentences.chinese: 阿书记耐心地和阿里甫讲道理，阿里甫根本不听。

sentences.english: A secretary Alifu patiently and speak the truth, do not listen to Alifu.
sentences.chinese: 阿书记耐心地和阿里甫讲道理，阿里甫根本不听。

sentences.english: This article presents doctor Qin Liangfu's experience in the treatment of multiple sclerosis (MS).
sentences.chinese: 介绍秦亮甫教授治疗多发性硬化的临床经验。

sentences.english: He replaced the receiver with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 吴荪甫放下电话听筒，微笑着。

sentences.english: This article presents the 50-year clinical experience of professor Qing Liangfu, a senior well-known TCM physician.
sentences.chinese: 通过总结名老中医秦亮甫教授50余年针灸临床经验。

sentences.english: As soon as the spacecraft landed, the Pathfinder went to work.
sentences.chinese: 甫一着陆，探路者立即展开工作。

sentences.english: What is more, Wu Sunfu's tragic destiny, too, implicitly conforms to traditional Chinese t…
sentences.chinese: 吴荪甫的悲剧命运也暗合了中国传统的天命观。

definition: at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
to not have had time/to have not yet/not to touch upon
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
